Html:
Hello,

I am trying to work through the example in the following post:  http://blogs.msdn.com/b/kashiffl/archive/2010/10/04/prism-v4-region-navigation-pipeline.aspx.

I understand the concepts and I understand the MEF, but I need to get this working using UNITY.  The main issue I am struggling with is how to connect the "ShellViewModel" to the ShellView in the application you download from the above mentioned article. 

Any help or guidance you can provide is greatly appreciated.

Hi,

I believe you could find the following section of the Prism documentation useful regarding how you can wire your ViewModel to your View using Unity container:

  • Chapter 6: Advanced MVVM Scenarios, Advanced Construction and Wire-Up (Creating the View and View Model Using Unity Section)

Additionally you could also find Chapter 3: Managing Dependencies Between Components, which explains the main differences between the two dependency injection containers used by Prism.

I hope you find this handy,

Agustin Adami
http://blogs.southworks.net/aadami
